body.p: This Project will provide an easy way to communicate between an NFC-enabled Android Device and an ACR Reader connected to your Desktop. Further informations can be found in the Wiki or Google Group .

This API for Java will provide an easy way to access an NFC Reader (like the Touch a Tag devices) to receive "beams" from your android device. So you can receive any data which can be send via android beam. Native applications, like the contact app (which will beam vcards), and your own apps are supported.

p.i: Currently it only supports recieving data from the Android Device, sending may be supported in a further version.
